text: Chris Horwill from the Alstom Grid, Stafford, UK was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2014 for contributions to testing and commissioning of flexible AC transmission systems. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missinghttps://www.facebook.com/x.emma.jay.x
title: Chris Horwill
